dict.string: Please authenticate to use the app
Allow access to the camera to update your profile picture for better identification by our roadside assistance providers.

Assist needs access to your location when in the background to quickly connect you with nearby roadside assistance services in case of a vehicle failure. Your location helps us dispatch the nearest service provider to your exact location.

Assist requires access to your location to provide real-time coordination with our network of service providers. In case of a breakdown, sharing your location ensures a swift and accurate response from our assistance team.

Assist needs access to your location when open to offer immediate assistance in case of a breakdown. We use your location to quickly identify the nearest available service providers to assist you on the road.
Assist needs permission to add photos to allow users to upload or add a profile picture. Your photo library is used exclusively for user customization purposes within the application
Assist requires access to your photo gallery to allow users to upload or add a profile picture. Your photo library is used exclusively for user customization purposes within the application.
Play using while you are hiking
